entries.journal_entry_description: You have been asked to get involved with an investigation into a number of break-ins at cybernetic labs on Rori.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: A Neo-Cobral gang operating near Narmle is in tune with most of the underworld action happening in the area. Go convince them to reveal anything they might know about how to find Ponda Baba.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The Neo-Cobral didn't know much about Ponda Baba except that he had been looking for some help in obtaining some high-tech cybernetics. Word is that he approached the Garyn Raiders.
entries.task01_message_box_text: The Neo-Cobral didn't know much about Ponda Baba except that he had been looking for some help in obtaining some high-tech cybernetics. Word is that he approached the Garyn Raiders.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Head to a Garyn Raider hideout and find out what they know about Ponda Baba.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: According to the Garyn Raiders, Ponda Baba tried to hire them to supply muscle so that he could break into some of the larger cybernetic labs on Rori and possibly even Naboo. The amount he was offering was laughable to the Garyn Raiders so they flat out refused, but Ponda told them how to get in contact with him if they changed their mind.
entries.task03_message_box_text: According to the Garyn Raiders, Ponda Baba tried to hire them to supply muscle so that he could break into some of the larger cybernetic labs on Rori and possibly even Naboo. The amount he was offering was laughable to the Garyn Raiders so they flat out refused, but Ponda told them how to get in contact with him if they changed their mind.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: On the outskirts of Narmle is a small park with a statue of a gungan warrior. Rotate the statue to face North as a signal to meet with Ponda.
entries.task04_utterance_wave_2: Tell Ponda to get out of here! We'll take care of this.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Lieutenant Tarc. Let him know that Ponda didn't show.
